repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: Hampton Normal and Agricultural Institute ephemera
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: Normal school chartered in 1870 in Hampton, Va. Collection contains fundraising appeals, advertisements for printing facilities, invitations to commencement exercises, a list of subscribers, an image of the campus (Virginia Hall and surrounding area), and a plan for an additional building.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], in the Hampton Normal and Agricultural Institute ephemera, 1882-1903 and undated, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accession(s) described in this finding aid: 2008-0180

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Hampton Normal and Agricultural Institute was chartered in 1870 in Hampton, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection contains fundraising appeals, advertisements for printing facilities, invitations to commencement exercises, a list of subscribers, an image of the campus (Virginia Hall and surrounding area), and a plan for an additional building.

did.unittitle: Hampton Normal and Agricultural Institute ephemera, 1882-1903 and undated
